body_html:
@tobegit3hub Good point. I'll incorporate your feedback. I'm working on a pull request to finalize the python3 docker builds: #6030

Once the PR is submitted, py3 images will be pushed to docker hub nightly. Release py3 images will be pushed starting from the next release.
body_text:
@tobegit3hub Good point. I'll incorporate your feedback. I'm working on a pull request to finalize the python3 docker builds: #6030
Once the PR is submitted, py3 images will be pushed to docker hub nightly. Release py3 images will be pushed starting from the next release.
body:
@tobegit3hub Good point. I'll incorporate your feedback. I'm working on a pull request to finalize the python3 docker builds: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/6030

Once the PR is submitted, py3 images will be pushed to docker hub nightly. Release py3 images will be pushed starting from the next release.
